headline.main: HADASSAH PLEDGES ANTI-NAZI SUPPORT; Pittsburgh Session Approves Roosevelt Policies, Demands Palestine Settlement

lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH, Oct. 29 -- Support of President Roosevelt and the forces of democracy throughout the world and a plea for resettlement of homeless Jewish masses in Palestine were enthusiastically approved by 1,500 delegates of Hadassah, women's Zionist organization of America, in adopting a six-point "declaration of principles" tonight when they opened their annual convention with a mass meeting in Carnegie Music Hall.
